column3: utACK db01839361ae01201c27d3a96f6346d76a8314e0. \nCould you also change `.appveyor.yml` from `@BUILD_BITCOIN_UTILS_TRUE@` to `@BUILD_BITCOIN_CLI_TRUE@`? Otherwise appveyor won't run `--usecli`\nhttps://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/1e8f88e071019907785b260477bd359bef6f9a8f/.appveyor.yml#L49

@ken2812221 Sure, like this?

```diff
diff --git a/.appveyor.yml b/.appveyor.yml
index d7ce2224e..57319d24f 100644
--- a/.appveyor.yml
+++ b/.appveyor.yml
@@ -46,7 +46,7 @@ after_build:
 before_test:
 - ps:  ${conf_ini} = (Get-Content([IO.Path]::Combine(${env:APPVEYOR_BUILD_FOLDER}, "test", "config.ini.in")))
 - ps:  ${conf_ini} = $conf_ini.Replace("@abs_top_srcdir@", ${env:APP
